snippet: Liberty Media, which has been circling Sirius for some time, says it will have bought or converted enough shares to control the company within 60 days — once the F.C.C. gives its blessing.
abstract: Liberty Media plans to increase its stake in Sirius XM Radio to more than 50 percent, edging it closer to victory in its contentious battle to control the company.
lead_paragraph: Liberty Media, which has been circling Sirius for some time, says it will have bought or converted enough shares to control the company within 60 days — once the F.C.C. gives its blessing.

headline.main: Liberty Media on the Cusp of Controlling Sirius XM
